replies.bodyText: It looks "worse" because it is formatter ... missed the & completly before ... now it is formatted ...
replies.author: ArneDeutsch

replies.bodyText: I could add preserving of newlines before and after the &. Guess that should work. Should I?
replies.author: ArneDeutsch

replies.bodyText:
I could add preserving of newlines before and after the &. Guess that should work. Should I?

Yes, please. UnorderedGroups and Alternatives should behave similar in that regard and also mimic what we are doing for groups with the new-line preservation.
replies.author: szarnekow

timeline.bodyText: We used to preserve line-breaks here. Is the change intentional?
timeline.author: szarnekow

timeline.bodyText: I'm not a fan of this change. Is this intentional?
timeline.author: szarnekow
